C E G H I K L P S T U V 

P

psi - package psi
Contains the factories to initialize and/or load the PSI client and the PSI server objects, as well as the factory methods to generate key descriptions, which are objects that can be used to provide external keys to the PSI objects.
psi.cache - package psi.cache
Contains the interface that users of the SDK should implement to support the caching of the results of encryption operations, which can then be read to speed-up PSI calculations that rely on the same inputs and keys.
psi.client - package psi.client
Contains the interface of the PSI client, which provides all the functionalities needed for the client-side PSI computation for any supported algorithm.
psi.exception - package psi.exception
Contains the exceptions thrown by the SDK.
psi.model - package psi.model
Contains the Java objects used for the communication between the client and the server, or objects are shared by both parties to provide common functionalities (such as statistics).
psi.server - package psi.server
Contains the interface of the PSI server, which provides all the functionalities needed for the server-side PSI computation for any supported algorithm.
PsiAlgorithm - Enum in psi.model
Lists all the supported PSI algorithms and the respective supported key sizes.
PsiAlgorithmParameter - Class in psi.model
Contains the information required to select the encryption algorithm to perform the psi calculation.
PsiAlgorithmParameter() - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiAlgorithmParameter
 
PsiAlgorithmParameter(PsiAlgorithm, Integer) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiAlgorithmParameter
 
PsiCacheProvider - Interface in psi.cache
An interface representing a key-value cache used by the SDK to store the results of heavyweight mathematical operations (such as encryption operations), which can be read in subsequent executions with the same inputs to speed up the execution.
PsiClient - Interface in psi.client
Interface that provides the methods that perform the client-side computation of the PSI for all the supported algorithms.
PsiClientException - Exception in psi.exception
This exception is thrown whenever an unexpected and not compliant condition occurs when creating the client objects or performing client operations, e.g., missing or incompatible keys.
PsiClientException(String) - Constructor for exception psi.exception.PsiClientException
 
PsiClientFactory - Class in psi
Offers a generic interface to load a specific PsiClient implementation and configuration based on the provided inputs (client session, key description and cache provider).
PsiClientKeyDescription - Class in psi
Contains the variables used by the client to perform encryption operations.
PsiClientKeyDescription() - Constructor for class psi.PsiClientKeyDescription
 
PsiClientKeyDescriptionFactory - Class in psi
Generates a PsiClientKeyDescription depending on the selected PsiClient implementation, requesting only the variables to be initialized.
PsiClientSession - Class in psi.model
Represents the response sent from the server to the client to initialize the client-side psi computation.
PsiClientSession() - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiClientSession
 
PsiKeyDescription - Interface in psi.model
Contains the key descriptions, which are the variables used in mathematical encryption operations either by the client or the server.
PsiPhaseStatistics - Class in psi.model
Tracks run-time statistics for different phases of the psi computation, such as the elapsed time and the amount of cache hit/miss.
PsiPhaseStatistics.PsiPhase - Enum in psi.model
 
PsiRuntimeConfiguration - Class in psi.model
Configuration object that can be used to configure the number of threads and max thread lifetime for psi calculations.
PsiRuntimeConfiguration(Integer) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiRuntimeConfiguration
 
PsiRuntimeConfiguration(Integer, Integer) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiRuntimeConfiguration
 
PsiServer - Interface in psi.server
Interface that provides the methods that perform the server-side computation of the PSI for all the supported algorithms.
PsiServerException - Exception in psi.exception
This exception is thrown whenever an unexpected and not compliant condition occurs when loading the server objects or performing server operations, e.g., missing psiCacheProvider implementation while it is enabled.
PsiServerException(String) - Constructor for exception psi.exception.PsiServerException
 
PsiServerFactory - Class in psi
Offers a generic interface to initialize or load a specific PsiServer implementation and configuration depending on the provided inputs (algorithm parameters, key description and cache provider).
PsiServerInitException - Exception in psi.exception
This exception is thrown whenever some data required to initialize a server session is missing or not compliant with respect to the sdk logic, e.g., missing keys.
PsiServerInitException(String) - Constructor for exception psi.exception.PsiServerInitException
 
PsiServerKeyDescription - Class in psi
Contains the variables used by the server to perform encryption operations.
PsiServerKeyDescription() - Constructor for class psi.PsiServerKeyDescription
 
PsiServerKeyDescriptionFactory - Class in psi
Generates a PsiServerKeyDescription depending on the selected PsiServer implementation, requesting only the variables to be initialized.
PsiServerSession - Class in psi.model
Object created during the initialization of a psi session which contains all the information required to load a PsiServer instance.
PsiServerSession(PsiAlgorithmParameter) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiServerSession
 
PsiServerSession(PsiAlgorithmParameter, Boolean, PsiServerKeyDescription) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiServerSession
 
PsiServerSession(PsiAlgorithm, Integer, Boolean, PsiServerKeyDescription) - Constructor for class psi.model.PsiServerSession
 
put(String, String) - Method in interface psi.cache.PsiCacheProvider
If the specified key is not present in the cache, stores it with the passed value.
